name: Black Bow of the Betrayer
effect:
When you strike with Black Bow of the Betrayer, your hero has long-range this combat.
[Hunter]: When an ally is dealt combat damage with Black Bow of the Betrayer, ready up to four of your resources.

name: Blessed Medallion of Karabor
effect: Remove Blessed Medallion of Karabor from the game ==> Move to the right of another friendly player. Use only on your turn.

name: Cursed Vision of Sargeras
effect: [Activate] ==> If you completed a quest this turn, turn target resource face down.
Sargeras burned away the Betrayer's eyes to gift him with the vision of the Legion.

name: Entry into the Black Temple
effect:
Pay 5 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card for each different class among allies in your party.

name: Illidan Stormrage
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
At the start of your turn, you may put a Traitor ally card from your collection into play.
"Feel the hatred of ten thousand years!"

name: Memento of Tyrande
effect: When a non-token ally is destroyed, its controller may put a Spirit ally token into play wit 1 [Holy] ATK / 1 health.

name: Stormrage Signet Ring
effect: 2, [Activate] ==> Put target equipment into its owner's hand. Use only on your turn.

name: The Fall of the Betrayer
effect:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: If target opposing hero's printed health is more than your hero's, draw a card.
"Every decision Akama made and every moment of his life since Illidan arrived, Akama planned for this moment." - Seer Kanai

name: The Skull of Gul'dan
effect: [Activate] ==> You pay 2 less the next time you pay a cost with X in it this turn.

name: Warglaive of Azzinoth, Left Hand of the Betrayer
effect:
Your hero has dual wield while you have another Warglaive.
When Warglaive of Azzinoth leaves play, put a Demon ally token named Flame of Azzinoth into play with 3 [Fire] ATK / 3 health and ferocity.

name: Warglaive of Azzinoth, Right Hand of the Betrayer
effect:
When you strike with Warglaive of Azzinoth, ready another one of your Warglaives.
When Warglaive of Azzinoth leaves play, put a Demon ally token named Flame of Azzinoth into play with 3 [Fire] ATK / 3 health and protector.

name: Zhar'doom, Greatstaff of the Devourer
effect: 1, Exhaust your hero, remove three ability cards in your graveyard from the game ==> Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally and heals 3 damage from itself.
